name: Ranjan Kumar
bio:
Hey, I’m Ranjan Kumar — I build smart, AI-powered workflows with n8n to automate tasks, save time, and simplify daily work.

I enjoy combining tools like Groq, OpenAI, WordPress, etc. to create powerful no-code/low-code automations. Whether it’s content creation or API integration, I focus on making workflows that are easy to use, practical, and ready to plug into your stack.

Sharing real-world automations to help others work smarter, not harder.
